messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-CustomScheduler node?
The ComfyUI-CustomScheduler node is a simple node for setting the sigma values directly in the ComfyUI application.
What should be the value of the last sigma for a full denoise in ComfyUI-CustomScheduler?
For a full denoise in ComfyUI-CustomScheduler, the last sigma value should be set to zero.
On which repository is ComfyUI-CustomScheduler based?
ComfyUI-CustomScheduler is based on code from the ComfyUI_tinyterraNodes repository.
What did the ComfyUI_tinyterraNodes repository demonstrate?
The ComfyUI_tinyterraNodes repository showed how to hide and show widgets within the ComfyUI application.
Is there any other scheduler node mentioned in the context?
Yes, the ComfyUI-SchedulerMixer is another scheduler node mentioned in the context.
What is the function of the ComfyUI-SchedulerMixer node?
The ComfyUI-SchedulerMixer node allows users to create a custom scheduler from a weighted average of the built-in schedulers.
Is the ComfyUI-CustomScheduler node compatible with the ComfyUI application?
Yes, the ComfyUI-CustomScheduler node is designed to be used within the ComfyUI application for setting sigma values directly.
